YTM

静态到期收益率

\[PV=\sum{\frac{CF_{i}}{(1+YTM)^{t_{i}}}}\]
\[r_{t}=\frac{p_{t}}{p_{t-1}}-1\]

估值到期收益率

\[PV=\sum{\frac{CF_{i}}{(1+YTM)^{t_{i}}}}\]
